title: Experience Untouched Tropical Samoa with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Picture yourself relaxing by the lagoon under the warm Polynesian sun, azure-blue water lapping at your toes in Samoa’s beautiful island of Savai’i. Treat yourself to a sun-kissed break at Amoa Resort Savai’i, perfectly positioned for you to make the most of the island’s natural beauty. Your tropical escape includes return wharf transfers, daily continental breakfast, a signature two-course dinner, a nightly cocktail per person and a tropical welcome drink on arrival, plus daily cultural activities to embrace the local traditions and culture of Samoa.
